PxVehicleTireForceCalculator Class Reference
[Vehicle]

Structure containing shader data for each tire of a vehicle and a shader function that computes individual tire forces. More...

#include <PxVehicleShaders.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 PxVehicleTireForceCalculator ()

Public Attributes

const void ** mShaderData
 Array of shader data - one data entry per tire. Default values are pointers to PxVehicleTireData (stored in PxVehicleWheelsSimData) and are set in PxVehicleDriveTank::setup or PxVehicleDrive4W::setup.
PxVehicleComputeTireForce mShader
 Shader function. Default value is PxVehicleComputeTireForceDefault and is set in PxVehicleDriveTank::setup or PxVehicleDrive4W::setup.
PxU32 mPad [2]

Detailed Description

Structure containing shader data for each tire of a vehicle and a shader function that computes individual tire forces.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

PxVehicleTireForceCalculator::PxVehicleTireForceCalculator (  )  [inline]

Member Data Documentation

PxU32 PxVehicleTireForceCalculator::mPad[2]

PxVehicleComputeTireForce PxVehicleTireForceCalculator::mShader

Shader function. Default value is PxVehicleComputeTireForceDefault and is set in PxVehicleDriveTank::setup or PxVehicleDrive4W::setup.

See also:
PxVehicleComputeTireForce, PxVehicleComputeTireForceDefault, PxVehicleWheelsSimData, PxVehicleDriveTank::setup, PxVehicleDrive4W::setup

const void** PxVehicleTireForceCalculator::mShaderData

Array of shader data - one data entry per tire. Default values are pointers to PxVehicleTireData (stored in PxVehicleWheelsSimData) and are set in PxVehicleDriveTank::setup or PxVehicleDrive4W::setup.

See also:
PxVehicleComputeTireForce, PxVehicleComputeTireForceDefault, PxVehicleWheelsSimData, PxVehicleDriveTank::setup, PxVehicleDrive4W::setup
